item.title: Mona add a quote by L. Frank Baum
item.description: "There is no place like home." -- L. Frank Baum

item.title: Mona add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Mona add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "Her sister's shoes. They sparkeled even in the darkening afternoon. They sparkeled like yellow diamonds, and embers of blood and thorny stars." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Mona add a quote by Kristin Hannah
item.description: "The at-home mother's life: it was a race with no finish line." -- Kristin Hannah

item.title: Mona add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "Maybe the definition of home is the place where you are never forgiven. So you may always belong there, bound by guilt. And maybe the cost of belonging is worth it." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Mona add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I think that enduring, committed love between a married couple, along with raising children, is the most noble act anyone can aspire to. It is not written about very much." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Mona add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Mona add a quote by Stephen Schwartz
item.description: "I've heard it said that people come into our lives for a reason Bringing something we must learn And we are led to those who help us most to grow If we let them and we help them in return." -- Stephen Schwartz

item.title: Mona add a quote by David Nicholls
item.description: "Just kidding' was exactly what people wrote when they meant every word." -- David Nicholls

item.title: Mona add a quote by Emma Donoghue
item.description: "Scared is what you're feeling. Brave is what you're doing." -- Emma Donoghue

item.title: Mona add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Mona add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "The circus arrives without warning. No announcements precede it. It is simply there, when yesterday it was not." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Mona add a quote by Erin Morgenstern
item.description: "Like stepping into a fairy tale under a curtain of stars." -- Erin Morgenstern

item.title: Mona add a quote by Beth Hoffman
item.description: "That's what friends should do. cherish the good and pretend not to notice the harmless rest." -- Beth Hoffman

item.title: Mona add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "I think there should be a rule that everyone in the world should get a standing ovation at least once in their lives." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Mona add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "Courage. Kindness. Friendship. Character. These are the qualities that define us as human beings, and propel us, on occasion, to greatness." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Mona add a quote by R. J. Palacio
item.description:
"MR. BROWNE'S SEPTEMBER PRECEPT:
WHEN GIVEN THE CHOICE BETWEEN BEING RIGHT OR BEING KIND, CHOOSE KIND." -- R. J. Palacio

item.title: Mona add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "Your deeds are your monuments." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Mona add a quote by Esmé Raji Codell
item.description: "So much of teaching is sharing. Learning results in sharing, sharing results in change, change is learning. The only other job with so much sharing is parenting. That's probably why the two are so often confused." -- Esmé Raji Codell

item.title: Mona add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Mona add a quote by Gillian Flynn
item.description: "You are better than any storybook, you are better than anything anyone could make up." -- Gillian Flynn

item.title: Mona add a quote by Kimberly McCreight
item.description: "Everyone has beacons. Lights that guide them home." -- Kimberly McCreight
